20110113011854.000|20110113011856.000|CC1|THE UNIVERSITY OF ARIZONA SITS  
20110113011856.000|20110113011858.000|CC1|IN THE MIDDLE OF THAT COMMITTEE,

20110113011900.000|20110113011903.000|CC1|BY HOSTING THIS CEREMONY, WE

20110113011905.000|20110113011909.000|CC1|PROCESS OF HEALING.             
20110113011909.000|20110113011910.000|CC1|TONIGHT WE HAVE A CHANCE TO PRAY
